issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Hello,

We have tried to add a title on any window for windows phone but Window title is not showing for windows phone.

*Testing Environment:*
Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.8.0.201611121409
SDK: 6.0.1.GA
Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 6.1.0
Windows emulator: 8.1 WVGA 4 inch 512MB

*Testing Code*
index.xml
{code}<Alloy>
 <Window class="container" title="Hello Window">
 </Window>
</Alloy>{code}

index.js

{code}$.index.open();{code}
Although I have tried for TabGroup.

*Testing Result*
Window title is not showing for windows phone.
fields.summary: Windows Phone: Window title is not showing

comments.body: Confirmed that the Windows 10 Mobile does not changes the appearance of Window title even when [ApplicationView.Title|https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/uwp/api/windows.ui.viewmanagement.applicationview.title#Windows_UI_ViewManagement_ApplicationView_Title] property is updated. So I would resolve this as "Won't Fix" because this is native behavior on Windows 10 Mobile.
